external_games.name: Train Simulator: The Racetrack: Aurora - Chicago Route Add-On

name: Train Simulator: The Racetrack: Aurora - Chicago Route Add-On
summary: Widely known as the "Windy City", Chicago has now been brought to life in Train Simulator, in the famed route The Racetrack Aurora - Chicago. The route begins under the skyscrapers of Chicago at Union Station, making its way through the urban landscape and out into the western suburbs.
